form.div:
Google
Click the "+" to the right of "Other calendars"
Select "From URL"
This URL grants access to your calendar. Do not write it down or share it.
Set URL of Calendar to
DO NOT "Make the calendar publicly accessible"
Select "Add calendar"
Apple
Open the Calendar app on your iPhone
Select "Calendars"
Select "Add Calendar", then "Add Subscription Calendar"
Set Subscription URL to
Select "Subscribe"
